name: pkgwide-str:print_engine
desc: string indicating the default print engine

name: pkgwide-fn:pvalue_fun
desc: function to style p-values throughout package

name: pkgwide-fn:prependpvalue_fun
desc: function to style p-values throughout package that include a "p" prefix, e.g. "p<0.001" or "p=0.12"

name: as_gt-expr:addl_cmds
desc: expression of {gt} commands appended to the end of each `as_gt()` call

name: tbl_summary-str:label
desc: glue string defining the final label displayed. any column in `.$meta_data` may be used.

name: tbl_summary-lgl:show_stat_footnote
desc: logical indicating whether to show footnote of displayed statistics

name: tbl_summary-str:continuous_stat
desc: glue string defining the default continuous summary statistics to display

name: tbl_summary-str:categorical_stat
desc: glue string defining the default categorical and dichotomous summary statistics to display

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous_by2
desc: default test for continuous variables with a 2-level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous
desc: default test for continuous variables with a 3- or more level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.categorical.low_count
desc: default test for categorical/dichotomous variables with minimum expected count <5

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.categorical.group_by2
desc: default test for categorical/dichotomous grouped/correlated variables with a 2-level by variable

name: add_p.tbl_summary-attr:test.continuous.group_by2
desc: default test for continuous grouped/correlated variables with a 2-level by variable
